Class SOCKET_ServerHandler

java.lang.Object
Client.Web.SOCKET_ServerHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Remote, ServerHandlerInterface
public class SOCKET_ServerHandler extends Object implements ServerHandlerInterface, Runnable
The type Socket server handler. An interface mantaining the Socket connection with the server.
